name: Schulte Table - Speed Reading
description:
4Brain is the best app for memory, attention and brain training. In it we collected the smart games for brain training, memory, attention, speed reading for children, teenagers and adults. If you are looking for brain games on attention, memory, intelligence and brain training, then you are on the right track, because with 4Brain you can easily train your brain and improve memory power, because it is an excellent brain and memory trainer.

Our 4Brain games are good because:
- suitable for people of all ages: both for kids and for adults;
- simple, useful, free brain and memory games;
- this is a full brain development and attention, memory training;
- it is easy to train your brain and memory with them;
- The best brain exercises to improve memory and daily brain training, will help you improve memory;
- it is possible to train your brain and memory without an internet connection on the way to work or home or at any free time at your convenience;
- it takes a minimum of your time, 2-5 minutes per day is enough to properly train your brain and memory.

Schulte Table:
Solve math puzzles and train your brain along with an exciting game - Schulte Table!

Install, improve memory and train your brain every day with the 4Brain app!
